original_title: 野村万作から 萬斎、裕基へ
overview: A new documentary film on traditional culture, planned and produced by the Pola Foundation for the Promotion of Traditional Culture, has been completed. The 50th film presents the essence of Kyogen, which transcends the generations of Mansaku Nomura, Mansai and Hiroki, spanning three generations of father and son.
title: The Living Tradition of Nomura Kyogen: From Mansaku to Mansai to Yuki
